editwarning-desc: Shows a warning message if several users edit the same article at the same time.
ew-notice-article:
Until $1 $2 other users get the warning that you're editing this article. You can extend this time period by clicking Show preview.
$3
ew-notice-section:
Until $1 $2 other users get the warning that you're editing this section. You can extend this time period by clicking Show preview.
$3
ew-warning-article:
User $1 opened this page for editing on $2 $3. You shouldn't make any changes for the next $4 $5 to avoid edit conflicts.
$6
ew-warning-section:
User $1 opened this section for editing on $2 $3. You shouldn't make any changes for the next $4 $5 to avoid edit conflicts.
$6
ew-warning-sectionedit:
One or more sections of this article are edited currently. Please edit a specific section or wait $1 $2 for bigger changes of this article, to avoid edit conflicts.
$3
ew-leave: You can leave this screen by clicking Cancel.
apihelp-editwarning-example-1: Deletes the lock entry of user 'Admin' with article number 1 (Main_Page)
apihelp-editwarning-example-2: Set a lock entry for user 'Admin' with article number 56 (Person:Sebastian_Schmid)
apihelp-editwarning-example-3: Deletes the lock entry of section 3 of user 'Admin' with article number 1 (Main_Page)
apihelp-editwarning-example-4: Set a lock entry for section 3 of user 'Admin' with article number 56 (Person:Sebastian_Schmid)
apihelp-editwarning-summary: Deletes or adds articles/sections of a user to the EditWarning Lock table based on the article id and/or section id
apihelp-editwarning-apiparam-ewaction: 'lock' will add an entry. 'unlock' will remove entry
apihelp-editwarning-apiparam-articleid: Article ID of the page you want to lock. (e.g. 56)
apihelp-editwarning-apiparam-section: Section ID of the article you want to lock. (e.g. 3)
apihelp-editwarning-apiparam-user: Valid User that the lock entry is related to (e.g. Admin)
